New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2023 年 11 月 3 日星期五 06:08:16 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Matthew Perry was looking ‘happy and healthy’ days before his death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/matthew-perry-was-looking-happy-and-healthy-days-before-his-death/23KKFDOQBVFKHIS4HO27ZFBU4A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/matthew-perry-was-looking-happy-and-healthy-days-before-his-death/23KKFDOQBVFKHIS4HO27ZFBU4A/ Close friend of Perry says he was “doing super well” with his sobriety before his death. Fri, 03 Nov 2023 06:04:10 +0000 Matthew Perry arrives at the premiere of "The Invention of Lying" in Los Angeles on Monday, Sept. 21, 2009. Perry, who starred as Chandler Bing in the hit series “Friends,” has died. He was 54. The Emmy-nominated actor was found dead of an apparent drowning at his Los Angeles home on Saturday, according to the Los Angeles Times and celebrity website TMZ, which was the first to report the news. Both outlets cited unnamed sources confirming Perry’s death. His publicists and other representatives did not immediately return messages seeking comment. (AP Photo/Matt Sayles, File)
